statements: SELECT full_name, birth_date, gender FROM patient_profile;
SELECT * FROM patient_profile WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, phone_number, address FROM patient_profile ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT birth_date, gender FROM patient_profile WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_profile;
SELECT full_name, gender, phone_number FROM patient_profile WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patient_profile ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gender) AS num_genders FROM patient_profile;
SELECT full_name, address, medical_imaging_data FROM patient_profile WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, full_name, electronic_health_records FROM patient_profile WHERE address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT * FROM imaging_data;
SELECT patient_id, imaging_date, modality FROM imaging_data WHERE modality = 'X-ray';
SELECT patient_id, imaging_date FROM imaging_data WHERE imaging_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY imaging_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, modality FROM imaging_data WHERE modality IN ('MRI', 'CT') ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, imaging_date, modality FROM imaging_data WHERE imaging_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT patient_id, imaging_date, modality FROM imaging_data WHERE modality = 'MRI';
SELECT * FROM imaging_data WHERE imaging_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%tumor%';
SELECT patient_id, imaging_date, modality FROM imaging_data ORDER BY imaging_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, record_date, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM health_records WHERE record_date > '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis FROM HealthRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords JOIN Patients ON HealthRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, ImagingData.imaging_type, HealthRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN ImagingData ON Patients.patient_id = ImagingData.patient_id JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id WHERE HealthRecords.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM medical_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT physician_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM physicians WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, imaging_type, imaging_results FROM medical_records JOIN imaging_data ON medical_records.patient_id = imaging_data.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, physician_name, appointment_date FROM medical_records JOIN appointments ON medical_records.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN physicians ON appointments.physician_id = physicians.physician_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM medical_records ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT physician_name, hospital_name, specialization FROM physicians WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM imaging_data WHERE imaging_type='MRI' AND imaging_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_reason LIKE '%follow-up%' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ImagingData;
SELECT patient_id, image_url FROM ImagingData WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT medical_condition, diagnosis_date FROM HealthRecords WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT appointment_date, notes FROM AppointmentSchedule WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ImagingData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_url FROM ImagingData WHERE date_added > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT id, patient_id, image_url FROM ImagingData WHERE patient_id = 10 AND date_added BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords JOIN Patients ON HealthRecords.patient_id = Patients.id WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY Patients.date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT ImagingReports.report_text, Patients.name FROM ImagingReports JOIN Patients ON ImagingReports.image_id = ImagingData.id WHERE Patients.id = 5;
